This the famous Bubble Burst game.

Created by Ognian Kabranov 2016

 Very simple game POP POP POP the bubles ... 

 1. TAP the screen: create a bubble
 2. TAP the buble to pop the buble
 3. If two buble collide they pop
 4. Fling a buble with a finger to another bubble to collide

 Have Fun
